# Comments
The date and hash of the current model run is:
```{r target-hash}
stri_c(
  c(
as.character(
  as.Date(
  tar_meta(mcmc_mcmc_hirt.hom, "time")[[2]]
  )
  ),
tar_meta(mcmc_mcmc_hirt.hom, "data")[[2]]
), 
collapse = "-"
)
```
